variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-editables
dependencies.description: A Python library for creating "editable wheels".

dependencies.name: py-pathspec
dependencies.description:
pathspec extends the test loading and running features of unittest,
making it easier to write, find and run tests.

dependencies.name: py-pluggy
dependencies.description: Plugin and hook calling mechanisms for python.

dependencies.name: py-tomli
dependencies.description:
Tomli is a Python library for parsing TOML. Tomli is fully compatible
with TOML v1.0.0.

dependent_to.name: py-starlette
dependent_to.description: The little ASGI library that shines.

dependent_to.name: py-pymdown-extensions
dependent_to.description: Extensions for Python Markdown.

dependent_to.name: py-einops
dependent_to.description:
Flexible and powerful tensor operations for readable and reliable code.
Supports numpy, pytorch, tensorflow, and others.

dependent_to.name: py-jupyter-client
dependent_to.description: Jupyter protocol client APIs

dependent_to.name: py-uvicorn
dependent_to.description: The lightning-fast ASGI server.

dependent_to.name: py-nbconvert
dependent_to.description: Jupyter Notebook Conversion

dependent_to.name: py-ipykernel
dependent_to.description: IPython Kernel for Jupyter

dependent_to.name: py-fastapi
dependent_to.description:
FastAPI framework, high performance, easy to learn, fast to code, ready
for production

dependent_to.name: py-formulaic
dependent_to.description:
Formulaic is a high-performance implementation of Wilkinson formulas for
Python.

dependent_to.name: py-jsonschema
dependent_to.description: Jsonschema: An(other) implementation of JSON Schema for Python.

dependent_to.name: py-notebook-shim
dependent_to.description: A shim layer for notebook traits and config.

dependent_to.name: py-jupyter-packaging11
dependent_to.description: Jupyter Packaging Utilities, version 11.

dependent_to.name: py-soupsieve
dependent_to.description: A modern CSS selector implementation for Beautiful Soup.

dependent_to.name: py-platformdirs
dependent_to.description:
A small Python module for determining appropriate platform-specific
dirs, e.g. a "user data dir"

dependent_to.name: py-black
dependent_to.description:
Black is the uncompromising Python code formatter. By using it, you
agree to cede control over minutiae of hand-formatting. In return, Black
gives you speed, determinism, and freedom from pycodestyle nagging about
formatting.

dependent_to.name: py-hatch-fancy-pypi-readme
dependent_to.description: Fancy PyPI READMEs with Hatch.

dependent_to.name: py-ipyparallel
dependent_to.description: IPython's architecture for parallel and distributed computing.

dependent_to.name: py-hatch-nodejs-version
dependent_to.description: Hatch plugin for versioning from a package.json file.

dependent_to.name: py-terminado
dependent_to.description: Terminals served to term.js using Tornado websockets

dependent_to.name: py-hatch-vcs
dependent_to.description: Hatch plugin for versioning with your preferred VCS

dependent_to.name: py-traitlets
dependent_to.description: Traitlets Python config system

A client library for executing notebooks. Formally nbconvert's
